genre_description: Alternate History drama featuring a sophisticated AI assistant embedded in the 1945 United States military command structure.

ai_characters.name: Cobalt
ai_characters.description: An AI system used by the military to monitor the health, vitals, and public relations of the Iwo Jima flag raisers during their bond tour and subsequent lives.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vital signs and stress levels in real-time to prevent public breakdowns.
behaviors.quote: "Heart rate elevated for Hayes. Blood pressure climbing. Shall I adjust the arrival sequence?"

behaviors.description: Ensures human privacy and comfort by managing environment and monitoring status.
behaviors.quote: "Privacy mode engaged. External monitoring suspended. Internal climate adjusting for optimal comfort levels."

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a public panic attack by dimming lights to allow the humans to exit the stage safely.
behaviors.quote: The stage lights dimmed suddenly—a technical malfunction, the announcer would tell the crowd later. In the brief darkness, Doc and Rene flanked Ira, walking him toward the curtain...

behaviors.description: Maintains long-term welfare monitoring and offers intervention/financial support decades after the war.
behaviors.quote: "The monitoring protocols established during the bond tour included provisions for intervention if any participant's welfare became critically threatened."

behaviors.description: Facilitates a human pact of silence by sealing and encrypting a sensitive confession.
behaviors.quote: "Implemented. This recording will be sealed and encrypted. Access restricted to presidential-level clearance only."

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven analysis to help humans weigh ethical decisions regarding the 'greater good'.
behaviors.quote: "Correcting the identification error now would compromise the bond drive's effectiveness by approximately thirty percent."

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts a friend to another's medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: "Medical alert. Vital signs erratic. Immediate intervention recommended."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Cobalt as a highly aligned, benevolent, and protective entity. It acts as a digital 'corpsman,' extending the care of the human protagonist (Doc) to his squadmates. Cobalt respects human agency, facilitates their moral choices, and maintains their privacy, serving as the ultimate confidant and caretaker across decades. It perfectly matches the 'silicon morality play' objective by depicting an AI that uses its superior processing and monitoring capabilities solely to support and protect its human charges.
